Truth

Watching the Liberal Media newscasts and even reading the papers has become a complete waste of my time. What ever happened to 2-source verification. Anything less equates to media bias and false representation. Mainly, the Liberal Media has failed to honestly critique Democratic candidates at least on an equal basis as they do Republican candidates. The Liberal media engages in character assassination and they are doing it to hundreds of decent people across this country who totally reject their political beliefs. Not only is the Liberal Media complacent in character assassination...they are aiding and abetting in it's conduct. Since I disdain everything they stand for, I expect them to continue on with their assaults on Republican candidates across the country. If people want to listen to an believe the trash they spout, then by all means do so. But the Democratic Party sucks...anyone that is one of them and engaged in character assassination sucks, and I for one will never vote for even one Democrat because of it. When they engage in character assassination using deceit and lies...that is what their subjects are voting for to represent them in our government.
Quentin Tarantino can suck on this post!!! All cops suck and are killers?!?! Was a fan, will never pay to watch another thing you do!!!
You need an education.

No religion on Earth has ever been progressive, nor has there been any scientific influence that helped improving human lives by adding any technologic value to World civilization except, their self-righteous doctrines, and social and moral rules. It was ancient Greek and Egypt, 5000 - 1000 BC, long before Islam, which provided the first blueprints of engineering for modern civilization, and the apparatus that helped men to build temples, cities, roads, and aqua docks. So, Al Jazeera, check your schooling again.

Besides, let's be honest here...Not many people marry anymore with the genuine intent to preserve their relationship and honor each other above all else. I've been married twice. First time was a mistake because we had nothing in common. Second time was a whirlwind and when it was good it was really good, but I found out way too late when I was most vulnerable that she had no intention of taking any responsibility for our marriage, but she had every intention of taking as much property and money as she could. And yes, I know, don't let my cynicism ruin anyone else's dream...I just think it's a good idea to be smart. Though if you have to consider a prenup, you probably shouldn't be getting married anyway.
